title: Voice Activity Conduct
description: Voice channels have more relaxed guidelines but still require respectful behavior.

rules.description: Interrupting music sessions (e.g., mass skipping or altering the queue) is not allowed. Please wait your turn or use a separate voice channel.
escalations: Depending on severity, you may be ticketed or removed.

rules.description: Spamming soundboard clips or audio in voice channels disrupts conversation and is prohibited.
escalations: Depending on severity, you may be ticketed.

rules.description: All streamed content must comply with our SFW policies and piracy guidelines. Streaming content you haven't legally purchased is not allowed.
escalations: Depending on severity, you may be ticketed or removed.
